DataStructures

Class CircularBuffer<ENTITY>

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataStructures.CircularBuffer<ENTITY>

  • public class CircularBuffer<ENTITY>
extends java.lang.Object
    A circular buffer is an array based queue implementation used for buffeing data flows. It has 1 array of fixed length and 2 pointers. The first pointer points the first stored element The second pointer points to the first empty position of the array.
    Author:
    kkmonlee
